title: Ctrip.com Expected To Dodge Dip In China Air Travel
text:
Booking.com and other Priceline properties will list on TripAdvisor's instant-booking platform, the companies said Wednesday, making TripAdvisor a bigger player in the travel-booking space. In a big expansion of its push into video streaming and Hollywood entertainment, Alibaba (NYSE:BABA) made an offer to acquire the Chinese equivalent of YouTube, Youku Tudo (NYSE:YOKU), in an all-cash deal valued at $3.6 billion. Google won a key appeals court ruling on a 2005 lawsuit filed by authors who object to the Internet giant making millions of books searchable online for free.
